alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Northumberland; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:19PM EDT until July 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 719 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millersburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millersburg, Lykens, Elizabethville, Williamstown, Port Trevorton, New Buffalo, Klingerstown, Urban, Liverpool, Wiconisco, Halifax and Gratz. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
